content: A Singapore, un modo di punire i criminali è di frustarli o di colpirli più volte con un bastone sulla schiena.
translations: eng:In Singapore, one method of punishing criminals is to whip them, or hit them several times on the back with a cane
eng:In Singapore, one method used to punish criminals is to whip or beat them multiple times on their back with a cane
